metadata.note: Coordinates are verified from multiple sources. Google ratings and review counts are as of January 2026.

markets.name: Sassoon Dock Fish Market
markets.full_address: Azad Nagar Off Cuffe Parade, Colaba, Mumbai 400005
markets.notes: One of Mumbai's oldest and largest wholesale fish markets; major landing center; early morning auctions; very busy during peak hours

markets.name: Malad Fish Market
markets.full_address: Sainath Road, Vijaykar Wadi Industrial, near Malad Railway Station, Malad West, Mumbai 400064
markets.notes: Very large wholesale and retail market; popular with locals and traders; heavy footfall; good bargaining possible; fresh catches

markets.name: Crawford Market Fish Section
markets.full_address: Lokmanya Tilak Road, Dhobi Talao, CST Area, Fort, Mumbai 400001
markets.notes: Historic market with dedicated fish and meat sections; mixed wholesale-retail; attracts traders and families; open longer hours

markets.name: Bhaucha Dhakka Fish Market
markets.full_address: Ferry Wharf Area, Mazgaon, Mumbai Port, Mumbai 400010
markets.notes: Major landing centre at Ferry Wharf; wholesale hub; bulk purchases available; direct from boats; very early morning peak

markets.name: Vashi Fish Market (APMC)
markets.full_address: APMC Complex, Sector 17, Palm Beach Road, Vashi, Navi Mumbai 400703
markets.notes: Navi Mumbai's main wholesale APMC market; bulk trader hub; mostly wholesale, limited retail; good for big quantity orders

markets.name: Diwale Gaon Fish Market
markets.full_address: Diwale Village, Sukir Manya Koli Marg, Sector 14, CBD Belapur, Navi Mumbai 400614
markets.notes: Very large coastal village market; fresh landing; village atmosphere; good for wholesale and retail; direct fishermen contact

markets.name: Citylight Fish Market
markets.notes: Popular mixed wholesale-retail market; high foot traffic; good for both traders and domestic buyers; central Mumbai location

markets.name: Versova Village Fish Market
markets.full_address: Versova Beach Jetty, Andheri West, Mumbai 400061
markets.notes: Beach-side landing and market; known for very cheap prices; vibrant village atmosphere; direct catch; peak early morning

markets.name: Khar Danda Fish Market
markets.full_address: Khar Danda Village, Khar West, Mumbai 400052
markets.notes: Koli village market; strong local landing point; direct fishermen interaction; good for retail and small wholesale

markets.name: Andheri Fish Market
markets.full_address: Near Andheri Station, Andheri West, Mumbai 400058
markets.notes: Busy suburban market; wholesale in early morning; retail throughout day; good for residential areas nearby

markets.name: Dadar Fish Market
markets.notes: Crowded central Mumbai market; serves mid-city residents; good retail focus; heavy afternoon traffic

markets.name: Machi Market, Tardeo
markets.notes: Known wholesale fish market in central Mumbai; trader-focused; limited retail; good for bulk orders

markets.name: CBD Belapur Fish Market
markets.full_address: CBD Belapur Town Centre, Navi Mumbai 400614
markets.notes: Town-center retail market; distinct from coastal Diwale village market; serves CBD residents; modern setup

markets.name: Kopar Khairane Fish Market
markets.full_address: Kopar Khairane, Sector 10, near Railway Station, Navi Mumbai 400709
markets.notes: Local Navi Mumbai hub; near station; variety of fish and shellfish; serves residential sector

markets.name: Ghansoli Gaon Fish Market
markets.notes: Local Ghansoli area market; serves nearby residential sectors; small but functional retail market

markets.name: Airoli Fish Markets (Multiple retail shops)
markets.notes: Multiple retail shops including 'Fish Stock Xchange FSX' (Sector 6) and 'The Fish Market' (Sector 20); branded retail format; convenient for nearby residents

ranking_criteria.global_rank: Based on wholesale importance, landing capacity, volume, and frequency of citations

scoring_factors.description: Whether market has direct fish landing from boats
Market size and wholesale trading volume
Number of vendors indicating market activity

stage_1_distance_filter.description: Get user location, calculate distance using Haversine formula, sort by distance, take top 5
stage_1_distance_filter.note: Convert lat/lng to radians before calculation

stage_2_ranking_filter.description: From top 5 nearest, calculate composite score and rank by final score
stage_2_ranking_filter.formula_advanced: score = 0.55 * (rating/5) + 0.25 * (1 - distance_norm) + 0.20 * log(1 + reviews) / log(1 + max_reviews)
stage_2_ranking_filter.recommendation: Use 'formula_advanced' for better results with review count credibility

special_notes.peak_hours: 4:30 AM - 10:00 AM for most wholesale/landing markets; avoid 11 AM - 3 PM for best selection
special_notes.bargaining: Possible in wholesale markets, especially early morning
special_notes.transportation: Most markets have auto/taxi access; nearby bus stops vary
special_notes.freshness: Best selection in early morning (5-8 AM)
special_notes.varieties: Pomfret, Surmai, Paplet, Rawas, Bangda, Crab, Prawn, Lobster are common across markets
special_notes.access: Some markets (Sassoon, Bhaucha Dhakka) require entry passes or association; inquire at entrance
